about_the_game:
Step into the divided city of New Savannah, 2058.

The acclaimed VR title Augmented Empire arrives on PC, offering an enhanced experience of this dystopian cyberpunk classic. Originally lauded on Oculus Quest for its gripping story, innovative mechanics, and star-studded voice cast, this definitive version brings the world of New Savannah to your screen with full controller support and improved accessibility features.
From the safety of your secluded hideout, guide a ragtag team of misfits and outlaws through a city torn apart by class divisions and corruption. Overthrow the elite in this turn-based RPG that blends tactical strategy with rich storytelling.

Features:

  • The definitive edition: Based on the highly praised Oculus Quest version, now enhanced for PC.

  • Tactical RPG gameplay: Command six unique characters, each with their own skills, across 26 missions and 60 handcrafted environments.

  • Engaging dystopian story: Unravel a tale of rebellion and survival, featuring voice acting by an All-Star Cast, including Kate Mulgrew, Nick Frost, and Garrick Hagon.

  • Accessible for all: Full controller support and accessibility options make this version more intuitive and inclusive than ever.

  • Customisable progression: Develop your team’s abilities and upgrades to suit your strategy.

  • Hours of immersion: Enjoy up to 10 hours of gameplay packed with turn-based action and cyberpunk intrigue.

Whether you're a long-time fan or a first-time player, experience Augmented Empire like never before - on PC. Are you ready to rise against the corrupt elite and reclaim New Savannah?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX950 or higher
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.00GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970

short_description: Enter dystopian New Savannah in Augmented Empire, an enhanced PC edition of the acclaimed VR cyberpunk RPG. Lead a squad of outcasts, topple the elite in turn-based battles, and customise your tactics. With star-studded voice acting, controller support, and accessibility, it’s time to rebel!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
